amendment.description: To require a report on participation in the Transition Assistance Program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2273 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2273 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rounds to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2282. (consideration: CR S3936; text: CR S3936) To require a report on participation in the Transition Assistance Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2273 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Rounds to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2282.
